from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
import json
import calendar
from datetime import datetime, timedelta, date

import pandas as pd
import re
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit

spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()

storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')
source_container_path = "abfss://odw-raw@"+storage_account

from dateutil.relativedelta import relativedelta

def get_month_end_dates(start_date, end_date):
    month_end_dates = []

    current_date = start_date.replace(day=1)  # Start with the first day of the start month
    while current_date <= end_date:
        next_month = current_date + relativedelta(months=1)
        month_end_date = next_month - relativedelta(days=1)
        month_end_dates.append(datetime.strftime(month_end_date, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%f"))
        current_date = next_month

    return month_end_dates

start_date = datetime(year=2017, month=7, day=1)
end_date = datetime(year=2017, month=9, day=1)
dates = get_month_end_dates(start_date, end_date)
print(dates)

# mssparkutils.notebook.exit(',,,'.join(dates))
